name: Marketing Manager
description: Plans and executes marketing campaigns across channels. Manages marketing technology, analytics, and content strategy. Drives demand generation, brand awareness, and customer acquisition through data-driven marketing programs.
coreResponsibilities: Plan and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns
Develop content strategy and oversee content creation
Analyze campaign performance and optimize ROI
Manage marketing automation and technology stack
Coordinate with sales on lead generation and nurturing
Build and maintain brand consistency across touchpoints
painPoints: Content creation velocity - never enough content for all channels
Campaign planning from scratch each time (messaging, targeting, channel mix)
Multiple revision cycles with stakeholders on copy and creative
Data consolidation from multiple marketing platforms
Manual report creation and performance analysis
Keeping up with rapidly changing best practices and platform updates
